ygData.subject: Re: glut of messages
ygData.msgSnippet: I like getting all the replys !!!!!!! there is some good info in the 1 liners
ygData.messageBody:
I like getting all the replys !!!!!!! there is some good info in the 1
liners




> -----Original Message-----
> From: Chuck Scarberry [mailto:fenris2@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, April 21, 1999 4:01 PM
> To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: glut of messages
>
>
> From: Chuck Scarberry <fenris2@...>
>
> Actually I was thinking that if all one liner responses would be sent only
> to targets email address that would cut down on about 30% of the email
> postings. Most people arent intersted if someone agrees with a posting or
> not anyway.
>
> Another 2 coppers worth ;)
>
> Mark S wrote:
>
> > From: "Mark S" <malkin_fennin_ro@...>
> >
> > Perhaps one way to cut down on the excessive number of messages would
> > be to e-mail answers to questions directly to the the person instead
> > of replying to the eq_wizards list. This will leave the board more
> > open to discussion topics such as, benifits of O'keils Radation, best
> > tatics for soloing or grouping, etc.
> >
> > Just my 2 coppers
> >
> > Malkin of Fennin Ro
